pageContext.claim: “Many Gang Members and some very bad people are mixed into the Caravan heading to our Southern Border. Please go back, you will not be admitted into the United States unless you go through the legal process. This is an invasion of our Country and our Military is waiting for you!”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration has shown no evidence that gang members are part of the migrant caravan from Central America. It is part of the "legal process" to apply for asylum once inside the United States. Except for the National Guard, members of the U.S. military are generally barred from enforcing immigration laws under the Posse Comitatus Act.
